mapper.select: select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by b.seq) AS id, b.* from (select * from freeReply where original_author=#{original_author} and original_regdate=#{original_regdate} order by seq) b) a
mapper.insert: insert into freeReply(original_author, original_regdate, author, content) values (#{original_author}, #{original_regdate}, #{author}, #{content})
mapper.select: select regdate, updatedate from freeReply where seq=#{seq}
select max(a.seq) as seq from (select seq from freeReply where author=#{author}) as a;
mapper.update: update freeReply set content=#{content}, updatedate=now() where author=#{author} and regdate=#{regdate}
mapper.delete: delete from freeReply where author=#{author} and regdate=#{regdate}
